channel.title: Twitter on JamaalRoach
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on JamaalRoach

item.title: #FanGauge | Exploring Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Ok, so this is not the football related content I had in mind BUT… this analysis of Donald Trump’s tweets on the Variance Explained blog got me thinking about twitter text mining and sentiment analysis. Now fooball twitter especially, is a treasure trove of sentiment in 280 characters or less. Everyday football fans tweet about clubs, players, managers and tactics. But what i wanted to focus on are the tweets posted live during games.
